name: Diliify
tagline: This aim of this BTP is to help neighbors in finding out the right tool or person in the near by area or in a simple terms a barter and job recommendation system.
body:
### Welcome to Dillify
This site enables the user to find out and recommend the right tool or person to neighbors in the near by region whenever required. It's like a barter and job recommendation site.We ask users to mention their set of skills on their profile on the basis of these skills and past user ratings one gets a job.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

It's now a repository on github but will soon become a full fledged site.

### Designer Templates
